//Inputs are into rockwell. 
//Inputs are actually outputs from PLC program or
//Outputs are from rockwell.
//Outputs are acutally inputs into PLC program or inputs on EIP network inside TwinCAT.

EIPTagAddInput,{Name;EtherCATStatus},{Type;UINT},{LinkToPlc;GVL_AutoGenerated.EtherCATStatus}
//EIPTagAddInput,{Name;EtherCATChangeCount1},{Type;UINT},{LinkToPlc;GVL_AutoGenerated.EtherCATChangeCount[1]}
EIPTagAddInput,{Name;ChangeCount},{Type;ARRAY;UINT;1:EtherDeviceCount},{LinkToPlc;GVL_AutoGenerated.EtherCATChangeCount}
EIPTagAddOutput,{Name;EtherCATChangeCountReset},{Type;BOOL},{LinkToPlc;GVL_AutoGenerated.EtherCATChangeCountReset}

// Reading CoE parameters and passing them to the rockwell controller.3 ways of doing this.

CoERead_To_EIP,{Index;8000},{SubIndex;1},{SlaveType;CTEU},{VarType;int},{VarName;FestExample}
CoERead_To_EIP,{Index;8000},{SubIndex;1},{SlaveType;EX260},{VarType;int},{VarName;ExampleVB600}
//CoERead_To_EIP,{Index;8000},{SubIndex;5},{SlaveAddress;1005},{VarType;int},{VarName;ValveStatusFeedback1}
CoERead_To_EIP,{Index;8020},{SubIndex;1},{SlaveName;MDR100},{VarType;int},{VarName;MDRPeakCurrent}
CoERead_To_EIP,{Index;8020},{SubIndex;2},{SlaveType;EP7402},{VarType;int},{VarName;MDRRatedCurrent}
